Question.Subject: FanFiction.net error. PLEASE HELP!?
Question.Content:
I can log into my page and get into most of the features but whenever I try to access story traffic and stats, i get this message:
FanFiction.Net Error An error has occurred while processing your request. Please email this error message to via support@fanfiction.com. All errors are logged for administrative and security purposes.
How do I fix this?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
well, did you e-mail the message?
As far as ff.net errors go, I usually find they resolve themselves within a few days (that doesn't mean that people aren't fixing them, I just don't know) If it doesn't, send the message again. And maybe again. You could try writing a full out e-mail to them.
Good Luck! (you might need it)

Answer.Content:
